Package model

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy1, Enemy2, Enemy3

    public abstract class Enemy
extends java.util.Observable
    abstract class for the 3 possible enemies. This class handles movement, storing their direction list and the basic getters and setters.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Enemy​(int speed, int health, int armor, int xPos, int yPos, java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> dir, java.lang.String name)
      constructs the enemy given their stats and their direction list for movement.

      • Enemy

        public Enemy​(int speed,
             int health,
             int armor,
             int xPos,
             int yPos,
             java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> dir,
             java.lang.String name)
        constructs the enemy given their stats and their direction list for movement.
        Parameters:
        speed - speed of enemy in int
        health - health of enemy in int
        armor - armor of enemy in int
        xPos - x coordinate of enemy in int
        yPos - y coordinate of enemy in int
        dir - enemy movement direction in LinkedList of String
        name - String representation of enemy name

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth​(int newHealth)

        Parameters:

      • move

        public void move​(int moves)
        moves the enemy the desired number of moves down its direction path. takes into account if the enemy is dead/escaped/frozen etc. after 2 moves, any enemy effect is worn off.
        Parameters:
        moves - the number of spaces down the path the enemy is to move

      • currentSpeed
